title: Wheat in Australia
brief_description: An instructional film that surveys the wheat industry in Australia: how wheat is grown, and how it is distributed within overseas and domestic markets; geographical areas of wheat growing; varieties; rust and the work of the Farrer; rotationand fertilization; ploughing, harrowing and sowing; hravesting and how a header works; bulk handling, testing and determination of FAQ; and the delivery to ships in ports or to flour mills. Commentary by Roger Climpson.
